function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Climate change impact on urban areas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rural-urban migration and pressure on infrastructure","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagion hotspots in slums and informal settlements","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data poverty and poor data leading to inadequate response and perpetuating inequality","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate supply chain resilience leading to disruption in essential supplies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"National considerations and geopolitical interests may prioritize big nations over international collaboration during global crises.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges being interconnected may require a complex system approach to resilience building.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inclusiveness promotion must be achieved at all levels to enhance resilience and adaptive capacities.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal access to vaccines","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hoarding of vaccines","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of capacity for local vaccine production","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of non-biodegradable personal protective gears leading to environmental pollution","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in vaccination distribution and administration","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in risk communication across states leading to different risk perceptions","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gaps in local production capacity and resilience across industries","category":"Economic
